question: Which state Government has decided to set up outdoor gyms at public places?
explanation: The Himachal Pradesh Government has decided to set up modern outdoor gyms at public places to connect the masses with the Fit India Movement. As part of the state government\'s initiative, recreational equipment for children and modern outdoor gyms would be set up at identified parks and public places of Dharamshala. The Fit India movement is a nationwide initiative to encourage people to remain healthy by including physical activities and sports in their daily lives. It was launched by Prime Minister Narendra Modi on National Sports Day (NSD-2019) Â in New Delhi.
